<!--
This project is intentionally opinionated.

Changes are evaluated on correctness, clarity, and long-term maintainability —
not on flexibility or feature breadth.
-->

## Summary

<!--
What problem does this change solve?
Avoid feature-centric descriptions when possible.
-->

## Motivation

<!--
Why is this change necessary now?
What breaks, degrades, or becomes risky without it?
-->

## Design & Constraints

<!--
Describe the approach taken and the constraints it relies on.
If this change removes or weakens an existing constraint, explain why.
-->

## Risks & Tradeoffs

<!--
What could go wrong with this change?
What risks are accepted by merging it?
-->

## Scope & Reversibility

- Is this change easy to undo without a rewrite? **Yes / No**
- Does this introduce new configuration or options? **Yes / No**

Explain any “Yes”.

## Validation

<!--
How was this change validated?
Tests, manual verification, invariants checked, etc.
-->

## Checklist

- [ ] Tests added or updated (or explicitly unnecessary)
- [ ] Documentation updated if behavior changed
- [ ] No new configuration or optionality introduced without justification
